promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute basic ibex fighting-type wearing rocky bracers. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fighting. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Brambock, a chibi cute basic ibex fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: karate-chop. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word ibex or fighting or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, ibex-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Brambock explore the canyons and climbs high to amaze. Its karate-chops delight with its cute bounce!
